pageProduct.name: Schick Hydro Silk Perfect Finish Kit
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Schick Hydro Silk Perfect Finish 3 In 1 Multizone Styler expertly trim & style to create your perfect look. Gently removes facial hair, easy bikini trimming and precisely shapes eyebrows.

Face
Gently smooth away facial hair.
- Designed to remove hair smoothly and quickly.

Eyebrows
Precisely shape and trim eyebrows.
- Dual sided trimmer allows for easy & precise shaping.
- Dual sided comb attachment trims eyebrows to a uniform length (2mm & 4mm).

Bikini
Expertly style your bikini line.
- Can be used on wet or dry skin.
- Get bikini-ready with skin-friendly trimmer and 4 adjustable comb lengths.

Other accesorries included:
- Cleaning brush
- AA Alkaline Battery
- Beauty bag

Boxed Contents: Multizone Styler with 7 accessories, AA battery

Size: 1 Pack
